intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Huh- whu– A child? Been a long time since I seen one of your kind around here,

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Children of course, what else would I mean?

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Look bud, now that you’re here I need your help with something.

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: You know how to swim right?

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Of course you do, why else would you be at a pool.

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Leave? The door is right over there–  ‘cept I locked it.

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: And I’ll unlock it, once you get my toys. They're down there, somewhere. You'll find ‘em.

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Once you find the toys just drop ‘em in my bucket here.

intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
intro.text: Oh, and don’t stay down there too long.

shop-intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
shop-intro.text: The lifeguard Freduck has supplies that can make your dive easier.

shop-intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
shop-intro.text: He's got flippers, scuba gear, spears, he'll setchya right up.

shop-intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
shop-intro.text: Oh, and when you see him, tell him to turn off that accursed music.

eelbert-intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
eelbert-intro.text: Oh this feller in my beard? Why that’s my pal Eelbert.

eelbert-intro.name: Daft Denayrouze:
eelbert-intro.text: He’s a sweetheart, he’ll warm up to ya.

first-level-1-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
first-level-1-toy-sold.text: Well you got one- theres a start.

last-level-1-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
last-level-1-toy-sold.text: Good work kid, but you’ll have to dive deeper still.

first-level-2-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
first-level-2-toy-sold.text: You’ve seen them by now, yes? They like to roam the mall.

first-level-2-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
first-level-2-toy-sold.text: The whispers tell me they were just like you once.

first-level-2-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
first-level-2-toy-sold.text: But I’ve learned not to listen to the whispers… heh heh heh.

last-level-2-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
last-level-2-toy-sold.text: You’ll be headed to The Husk next…

last-level-2-toy-sold.name: Eelbert:
last-level-2-toy-sold.text: Say a prayer to whatever god you hold dear, not that he can hear you down there–

last-level-2-toy-sold.name: Eelbert:
last-level-2-toy-sold.text: He didn’t hear my prayer, and certainly didn’t hear theirs.

first-level-3-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
first-level-3-toy-sold.text: That boat down there in The Husk… it was important to me once,

first-level-3-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
first-level-3-toy-sold.text: I ain’t quite sure how, but I feel like it.. carried me here to this place.

first-level-3-toy-sold.name: Eelbert:
first-level-3-toy-sold.text: You frail useless stupid daft old man, the boat was yours.

first-level-3-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
first-level-3-toy-sold.text: Daft! That’s what they call me, Daft Danyrouze!

last-level-3-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
last-level-3-toy-sold.text: Well I’ll be, that's all of em.

last-level-3-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
last-level-3-toy-sold.text: I’m impressed kid, you didn’t lose your way, not like the others.

last-level-3-toy-sold.name: Eelbert:
last-level-3-toy-sold.text: You still will. The memories of the depths will eat away at your mind.

last-level-3-toy-sold.name: Eelbert:
last-level-3-toy-sold.text: And they will until there's nothing left but a fresh husk for me to crawl my way into.

last-level-3-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
last-level-3-toy-sold.text: Now now Eelbert, theres no need for hostilities.

last-level-3-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
last-level-3-toy-sold.text: Welp, door’s open. You’re free to go. Or you could just stay here with me and Eelbert, we could use the company.

last-level-3-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
last-level-3-toy-sold.text: And there’s always more toys that need collectin'.

past-last-level-3-toy-sold.name: Daft Denayrouze:
past-last-level-3-toy-sold.text: So you decided to stay. Say I hear Freduck is sellin his radio, maybe you can take it off his hands,

post-game-1.name: Daft Denayrouze:
post-game-1.text: When I die, cast me back into the deep.

post-game-1.name: Daft Denayrouze:
post-game-1.text: If I die, I ain’t quite sure that’s in the cards for me.

post-game-2.name: Daft Denayrouze:
post-game-2.text: The souls of the ones you’ve slain, you think they can rest now?

generic.name: Daft Denayrouze:
generic.text: Well, scram. My toys ain't going to collect themselves.
